title: I cant download the new update patch.
body: When I start the game it says " Update Failed Unspecific error occurred Please check the logs for more Information." I even uninstall the game and installed it again and it still says the same error. What do I do?

replies.body: I'd like to help but need some more details!  At what percent on the patcher are you receiving this error, or do you have a screenshot?  Let me know!
